item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:154 Chances: The stock could be worth 30% more based on the growth of its artificial intelligence software platform and free cash flow margins All signs point to Palantir joining the S&P 500 soon In 2023, Palantir stock rebounded from all-time lows. But one Wall Street analyst thinks the best days are ahead Learn why Palantir is just getting started AI could be the gold rush of the 21st century Risks: In the most recent trading session, Palantir Technologies Inc.
